title: Geometry Quiz
quizMessage: Test your geometry knowledge with this quiz!

questions.question: What is the name for a triangle that has all three sides the same length?
What makes a triangle Isosceles?
options: It has two sides of equal length
It has three sides of equal length
questions.answer: It has two sides of equal length

questions.question: If the three angles of a triangle measure 60, 80, and 40 degrees what type of triangle is it?
